name: Alarmy
description:
Alarmy is game where an alarm clock breaks into pieces and has to find all of his parts to wake Jerry up to go to school at 7:00am. A fast paced, no thinking, just quick movement game provides extreme fun!

This game was made in a short time limit for the 2022 Brackeys Game Jam if you're wondering where the audio is and if you're encountering a few bugs.

ALT+F4 to exit.
